com.percolate.caffeine

Class CountUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.percolate.caffeine.CountUtil

  • public class CountUtil
extends java.lang.Object

    Utility methods for formatting counts

    Common uses:

    CountUtil.getFormattedCount(1200000); // returns "1.2m"

      • getFormattedCount

        public static java.lang.String getFormattedCount(java.lang.String count)

      • getFormattedCount

        public static java.lang.String getFormattedCount(java.lang.Long count)
        Used to format a given number into a short representation. Examples: Given 9100, will return "9.1k". Given 8100000, will return "8.1m" Given 10, will return 10"
        Parameters:
        count - Value to convert.
        Returns:
        Formatted value (see examples)
